hero.cta: First, I solve the problem. Then, I write the code.

aboutMe.title: Rendering My Story
aboutMe.paragraph1: I got into the world of development after working in other fields, and since then I’ve discovered that programming gives me the freedom to create things from scratch. I’ve always loved technology — I just needed that final push to dive in completely.
aboutMe.paragraph2: I enjoy spending hours coding, learning, and solving problems. I’ve learned that mistakes are part of the process: every bug I’ve fixed has taught me to become a better developer. When something doesn’t work, I don’t stop until it does — and I love that moment when everything finally clicks. I believe that mindset is what drives me to keep growing and improving with every project.
aboutMe.paragraph3: Creating a website is like building a universe: you start from nothing, and line by line, you create something that others can enjoy..

skills.title: My Personal Stack
skills.paragraph: My stack represents the journey I've taken, learning and improving with every line of code. Each tool I use is part of my way of creating, optimizing, and bringing ideas to life.

projects.title: Creating Real Solutions
projects.paragraph: I believe technology makes sense when it improves something real. Every project I develop is born with that idea: to create solutions that connect, simplify, and generate impact.
projects.description1: Human resources management system developed to optimize internal processes, improve communication, and facilitate personnel administration in companies of various sizes.
projects.description2: E-commerce platform designed to provide an intuitive and secure shopping experience, with advanced features for product management, payments, and shipping.
projects.description3: Corporate website for a development and design agency, showcasing its services, portfolio, and facilitating contact with potential clients.
projects.description4: Website for a gourmet burger restaurant, focused on displaying its menu, location, and allowing online reservations.
